item.title: SVG Interfaces
item.description: Overview SVG Interfaces is an on going project exploring the design and implementation of custom controller interfaces, bridging the issue of user mapping between action and sound in interactive music systems. We have developed a simple framework utilizing functional specifications for musical interfaces and their mappings.
